item.title: Featured Poet: Yannick Marshall

item.description: [from Old Friend, We Made This for You] WAITING FORÂ METRO Yannick Marshall — Waiting for Metro from Baraza Video on Vimeo. i) i have a gun in a Hardo Bread bag waiting for Metro marching from the marshlands of Suburbia, to occupy our lands waiting the snails will no longer be crushed, by black boots … Continue reading Featured Poet: Yannick Marshall →
